title: Keller 1905 Open Letter To the New College Girl

content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Keller makes to achieve her purpose of giving advice to young women about to undertake a college education.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Keller makes to achieve her purpose of giving advice to young women about to undertake a college education.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
